body:
@colesbury two instances of segfaults caused by overflow have been reported
lately.

On Wed, Jul 18, 2018 at 21:52 Sam Gross <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> *@colesbury* requested changes on this pull request.
>
> We shouldn't be blindly changing int to int64_t. What's the purpose of
> this change?
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
